= Introduction =
Welcome to the public Minimum intrusion Grid wiki. On these pages you can communicate with the MiG team and find information about the project.
You can use the sidebar in the left margin to navigate the wiki, but you can also take a look at the [http://code.google.com/p/migrid/w/list full page index].
